text:
In the documentation for apache2.0, it mentions using the make
target "make certificate" to create a dummy cert for testing.
This target does not exist at the top level or within the mod_ssl
directory
creator: rcoleman@criticalmagic.com

text:
I believe that the concensus about this issue when it was last addressed was
that Apache 2 was not going to provide "make certificate".  If that remains
the case, then this is really a documentation issue.
creator: slive@apache.org
jwoolley@apache.org
text:
Done.  The documentation references to "make certificate" have been removed.  This 
change will appear in 2.0.37.
